placeDesc: This once booming gold town has been preserved as a national historical landmark.Virginia City consists of territorial shops, hotels, and even a opera house that performs turn of the century theatre and vaudeville. You can tour Boot Hill and also take a Ghost Tour after dark. They also host a festival and ball each summer where everyone dresses in Civil War era clothes.As a bonus, you’ll also find one of the best old-time candy stores in Montana there.
placeShortDesc: An entire town preserved as a historic landmark.
placeNearby: Old Pitt's Burial Site,Earthquake Lake,Madison Buffalo Jump State Park
placeRelatedPlaces: Casa de Fusta,Fordlândia,The Highest Court In the Land,Ithaa Undersea Restaurant
